    • createClient

      public void createClient(String chosenUsername, int chosenTechnology, String chosenAddress, int chosenPort)
      This method handles the creation of a client contacting a remote server
      Parameters:
      chosenUsername - the username of the client chosen by the user
      chosenTechnology - the technology chosen by the user
      chosenAddress - the remote server ip address
      chosenPort - the remote server port number
